#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long a,b,c,d,r,diff,flag=1,t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&a,&b,&c);
        if((b-a==c-b)&&(b!=a))
        {
            diff=c-b;
            printf("AP %lld\n",c+diff);
        }
        else
        {
            r=c/b;
            printf("GP %lld\n",c*r);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
